SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am52
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am52.model.cards

Class StarterCardFrontFace

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am52.model.cards.CardFace
it.polimi.ingsw.am52.model.cards.StarterCardFace
it.polimi.ingsw.am52.model.cards.StarterCardFrontFace
All Implemented Interfaces:
Pluggable, ResourcesProvider
public abstract class StarterCardFrontFace extends StarterCardFace
The front face of a Starter card. Every starter card has one or more permanent resources on its front face.

  • Constructor Details

    • StarterCardFrontFace

      private StarterCardFrontFace(CardCorner topRight, CardCorner bottomRight, CardCorner bottomLeft, CardCorner topLeft, Resource permanent)
      Creates a front card fae of the starter card wit the specified corners and one additional resource.
      Parameters:
      topRight - The top-right corner of the card face.
      bottomRight - The bottom-right corner of the card face.
      bottomLeft - The bottom-left corner of the card face.
      topLeft - The top-left corner of the card face.
      permanent - The permanent resource.

    • StarterCardFrontFace

      private StarterCardFrontFace(CardCorner topRight, CardCorner bottomRight, CardCorner bottomLeft, CardCorner topLeft, Resource permanent1, Resource permanent2, Resource permanent3)
      Creates a front card fae of the starter card wit the specified corners and three additional resources.

      topRight - The top-right corner of the card face.
      bottomRight - The bottom-right corner of the card face.

      topLeft - The top-left corner of the card face.
      permanent1 - The permanent resource.
      permanent2 - The permanent resource.
      permanent3 - The permanent resource.

  • Method Details

    • getCards

      public static ImmutableList<StarterCardFrontFace> getCards()
      Get all front faces of Starter cards. The list is sorted as the card pictures on the ref. manual.
      Returns:
      A list with all front faces of the Starter cards.

    • getPermanentResources

      public ResourcesCounter getPermanentResources()
      Every starter card has one or more permanent resources on its front face.
      Overrides:
      getPermanentResources in class CardFace
      Returns:
      The permanent resources of the front face.

    • getResources

      public ResourcesCounter getResources()
      The front faces of starter cards have one or more permanent resources. This method takes into consideration both resources visible on the corners and the permanent resource.
      Specified by:
      getResources in interface ResourcesProvider
      Overrides:
      getResources in class CardFace
      Returns:
      The resources associated to this card face.

    • getCardSide

      public CardSide getCardSide()
      Specified by:
      getCardSide in class CardFace
      Returns:
      The side of the card associated to this card face.
